name: Source Collaboration Reassigned
description: Notifies the admin when a source that has been reassigned by current assignee to another user.
subject: The $referenceName configuration has been reassigned to another user
body:
Dear $__recipient.name,

$assignedByUser has reassigned the $referenceName source onboarding to $assignedUser. $assignedByUser no longer have access to this source.


#if(!$assignedUserHasAccess)

$assignedUser needs the Source Configuration Assignee user level to configure this source. To grant this user level to $assignedUser, go to their identity and enable the Source Configuration Assignee user level.


#end#if($revokeLastAssignedAccess)

$assignedByUser does not have any other sources assigned to them and the Source Configuration Assignee user level should be revoked. Go to their identity to remove this user level.


#end
Thanks,
The $__global.productName Team
